name: Sumo Force
description:
Blasted into an unknown dimension, a 24-year old sumo must handle himself against an army of deadly robots who want him literally toasted! Can you survive long enough?

Credits:

Andrew Taylor Johnson

Parker McAdams

Ben Smoot

Daniel Peterson

Victor Lopez

Instructions:

"T" to start
"W,A,S,D" to move

"<" to attack
